revised_title: Advancements in Non-Aqueous Battery Systems: Lithium-Based Primary and Secondary Batteries
tldr: This article discusses the development and applications of non-aqueous battery systems, focusing on lithium-based primary and secondary batteries. It covers the chemistry, materials, and design of these batteries, including their wide range of applications, from consumer products to electric vehicles and stationary uses. The article also highlights the advantages of lithium-based batteries, such as high energy density, wide operating temperature range, and extended shelf-life.
